description:
Heir to Juneau and behind the attacks on the school turning the students into vampires, including Kaichou and Hikosaka. He changed as many people as he could to vampires as a way in serving Mina, believing he was making an army to create a new world for Vampires. He shows no respect to his father, believing he is a person of the past. He too also shows a racist hatred to Werewolves, wishing to have them exterminated in the new vampire world ruled by the "young".
Mina kills him, seeing his new world idea as just a grand delusion, but before that learn of the Terrorist Organisation Telomere was behind her assassination attempt.
name: Jean Marais Dermaille
